documents.document: @tvlive yes!!!!! Oh how I loved Super Channel. Then NBC Europe. My childhood.

@Ahall41116 @hotelindigo yes I believe it was princes street. nice little hotel. Back to Dublin tonight. Was at Indigo Paddington all week.
@Ahall41116 @hotelindigo it's a great location on the tram line. Stayed there last year.

@HailoIreland third time lucky I home. Trying to get home from Dublin Airport. First cancelled. Now 42908 arrived and picked up someone else

Very productive few days in London with clients. Our office has amazing views. Back to Dublin time now. https://t.co/kTnUjpi8Fa
@Golden_Gaytime yeah. Very fast channel switching now.
@Golden_Gaytime it's TVPlayer from the UK store. Update before Christmas with a new UI. Create a free account to unlock most channels.
Back working from London this week ahead before spending the weekend in Glasgow celebrating Vinnie's Birthday :-) Looking forward to both.

@Golden_Gaytime no! As UTV sold to ITV who have an exclusive content deal with TV3/Virgin. So it's not in the interest of Virgin to offer it

@anticdent it's like brexit - is it or isn't it happening :-)
It's a shame @utv got greedy & tried & failed to launch an Irish channel. Once upon a time @utv and @TV3Ireland co existed nicely. No more.
Well that was fast. @UTV @UTVIreland has been removed from @VirginMediaIE - Channel 110 ended with an advert for @TV3Ireland - Bye @ITV :-(
@CyberAndrew good and early this year. Hate that odd period seeing the lights up but off.

@netmag A manipulator capable of aligning many solutions into a uniform experience in which people can instinctively use and want to use.
Happy New Year. Looking forward to getting back to work tomorrow! Great plans ahead this year starting with reading… https://t.co/HHpM86eFI7
I can hear the crowd at @NYFDublin from the apartment singing "I will wait.. " - must be another sound check!!
Honestly given the year - it would seem @rte are in full on wake mode with their New Years Eve "live" programming. Such depressing music.
@NYFDublin @Briandeady @periscopeco lol. It's only on TV now saying live!
Happy New Year. What a year of change personally. Roll on 2017. I'm sure more change - but bring it on. So motivated at this stage #Stronger
@UKMUJI question. On your website it says you deliver to UK and Europe. But Ireland isn't on your list. Can you ship to Ireland? Thanks!

@Dublin_ie @NYFDublin I think they "launch" later today. Shame it's in a part of city many will bypass or never venture round to.
Loving the @RosenfeldMedia sale. Two UX books ordered so far. I'm sure I'll be dropping back for more. Roll on the new year for new reading.
@AerLingus is there a way to request missing points? It's for a flight flown a day into aerclub but flown on my old GC ID.
@AerLingus I was able to on Avios, which is great. But your site doesn't remember my bookings until you fix this. I've missed points too....
@AerLingus finally getting around to sorting out my aerclub account. I can’t change my email address.The contact us page doesn’t help.Can u?
Got to love this time between Christmas and the New Year. I use it to plan & I'm planning on expanding my UX team. If you are looking DM me.
All the UK soaps have #LastChristmas playing tonight. I wonder if it was a last minute edit.
Really enjoyed the Christmas Message from Daniel and @Majodonnell on @TV3Ireland

As the Christmas rush starts to slow down & the focus turns to family, loved ones & friends. I hope this Christmas brings you happiness. 🎄🎄

I adore my company - so refreshing learning their approach to fostering culture. Mindfulness is being used throughout. Absolutely love it.
